metadata.synopsis: A highly trained legionnaire turned mercenary is forced to take on his former comrades to protect people in a local village who nurse him back to health after a mission goes wrong in South America.

reviews: It's not one of my favorite Jesse V. Johnson joints, but it's still really badass when it wants to be and an action movie I'd recommend to any hardcore #HeavyAction fans.
Vandenberg and Johnson bring their ace action skills to the table and provide some really strong hand-to-hand and gun battles. It's what you come to a movie called The Mercenary for.
Good action showcase for Belgian martial artist Dominiquie Vandenberg.
